summary: Guns N' Roses is an American rock band formed in 1985 in Los Angeles. Their classic lineup included Axl Rose (vocals), Slash (guitar), Izzy Stradlin (guitar), Duff McKagan (bass), and Steven Adler (drums). Their debut album, "Appetite for Destruction" (1987), became hugely popular, with hits like "Sweet Child o' Mine" and "Welcome to the Jungle." The band's style mixed punk, blues, and heavy metal, moving mainstream rock away from glam metal. They toured extensively and released several successful albums, but faced personal conflicts and lineup changes. In 2016, Slash and McKagan rejoined for the Not in This Lifetime... Tour, one of the highest-grossing tours ever. Guns N' Roses has sold over 100 million records worldwide.
title: Guns N' Roses
